#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

/*void sortarr(int arr[], int n)
{
	int i, j,t;
	for(i=0; i<n-1; i++){
		for(j=i+1; j< n; j++){
			if(arr[i]>arr[j]){
				t = arr[i];
				arr[i] = arr[j];
				arr[j] = t;
					
			}
		}
	}
}*/

int partition(int a[], int p, int r)
{
	int x, i,j,temp,t2;
	x = a[r];
	i = p-1;
	for(j=p; j<=r-1; j++){
		if(a[j] <= x){
			i++;
			temp = a[i];
			a[i] = a[j];
			a[j] = temp;
		}
	}
	
	t2 = a[i+1];
	a[i+1] = a[r];
	a[r] = t2;
	
	return (i+1);
}
void quicksort(int a[], int p, int r)
{
	int q;
	if(p<r){
		q = partition(a, p, r);
		quicksort(a, p, q-1);
		quicksort(a, q+1, r);
	}
}

void swap(int p, int q, int arr[], int n)
{
	if(q<n){
		int t;
		t = arr[p];
		arr[p] = arr[q];
		arr[q] = t;
	}
}
int main()
{
	int t, i, k;
	cin>>t;
	int n;
	for(i=0; i<t; i++){
		cin >> n;
		int arr[n+1];
		for(k=0; k<n; k++){
			cin >>arr[k];
		}
		//sortarr(arr, n);
		quicksort(arr, 0, n-1);
		/*	for(k=0; k<n; k++){
			cout << arr[k] << " ";
		}*/
		
		for(k = 1; k<n; k=k+2){
			swap(k, k+1, arr, n);
		}
		
			for(k=0; k<n; k++){
			cout<<arr[k]<<" ";
		}
		
		cout<<endl;
	}
}
